name: Trivandrum - Satsang with Santhi
description:
School of Santhi welcomes you to a beautiful evening with Santhi!

Satsang is a combination of two words, Sat and Sang. ‘Sat’ means essence. ‘Sang’ means meeting and hence Satsang means meeting with the essence.

The purpose of Satsang is to stop the chattering mind and remain in oneness with the inner essence. This will give you the possibility to understand the answers for many of your questions in life.

Santhi has a unique approach to make you look inside, see your own life and understand the meaning of your existence. This satsang aims to give you the keys needed to open up and look inside yourself, which is the start for making the changes you are looking for in life. All participants will get the opportunity to ask their personal questions and Santhi will sublimely guide you into finding the answers on your own.
